title: IM-MoCo: Self-supervised MRI Motion Correction using Motion-Guided Implicit Neural Representations
details: Z Al-Haj Hemidi, C Weihsbach, MP Heinrich - arXiv e-prints, 2024
abstract: Abstract Motion artifacts in Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) arise due to relatively long acquisition times and can compromise the clinical utility of acquired images. Traditional motion correction methods often fail to address severe motion, leading to …
